oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Ursula Greene, 1976 August 12, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Ursula Greene, conducted on 12 August 1976 by Jane King as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Greene discusses going to the Centennial with her boyfriend and women's fashion during the 1890s. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Ursula Daimwood, 1876-1979--Interviews
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
